title: Ryze Champion skills video not displaying updated ablitilies.
body:
Ryze has a new Ultimate ability called realm warp.

the video on the champion abilities tab does not show the new ability.

just something riot should be noted on.

replies.body: We're in the process of updating them. Thanks for the report! ^-^
Came here to say it.  Looks like the others are updates, just his ult has the old video.
